post.text: Join me in Akron, Ohio - for a few minutes! TOGETHER- WE WILL MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Caden
comment.text: America First!!! Let's take care of our veterans and active duty members. Including our police, firefighters, border patrol and paramedics- those that serve deserve to have a government who supports them and puts their interest first.

replies.author: John
replies.text: I'm a vet and you are right on spot with that.

replies.author: Brandon
replies.text: I'm a vet and a nurse. Go Trump!

replies.author: Madeline
replies.text: John Thank You for your service to our country. üá∫üá∏‚ù§Ô∏è

replies.author: Kailani
replies.text: The polls, the media, our corrupt leaders, all bought and paid for. I dont buy it do you? Please please ohio vote for Trump we need you to help us stop our corrupt leaders once and for all!
